class.name: SkeletonModification2D
class.brief_description: A resource that operates on [Bone2D] nodes in a [Skeleton2D].
class.description: This resource provides an interface that can be expanded so code that operates on [Bone2D] nodes in a [Skeleton2D] can be mixed and matched together to create complex interactions. This is used to provide Godot with a flexible and powerful Inverse Kinematics solution that can be adapted for many different uses. Modifications will update in node order. Set [member Node.process_priority] to control the order relative to other nodes or to ensure updating after [AnimationPlayer].

method.name: _draw_editor_gizmo
method.description: Handle rendering of a custom gizmo by calling draw_ methods on [member skeleton_path]. You must first call [method set_editor_gizmo_dirty] to force the gizmo to draw, if in editor.

method.name: _execute
method.description: Allows custom logic to run on this modification during internal process. delta is the frame time since last execute.

method.name: _is_property_hidden
method.description: Return true if this property should be hidden from the inspector.

method.name: clamp_angle
method.description: Takes a angle and clamps it so it is within the passed-in [param min] and [param max] range. [param invert] will inversely clamp the angle, clamping it to the range outside of the given bounds.

method.name: draw_editor_gizmo
method.description: Manually render the editor gizmo on the [Skeleton2D] node, if in editor.

method.name: editor_draw_angle_constraints
method.description: Helper function to draw a gizmo for an angle constraint.

method.name: execute
method.description: Manually process the modification. If the modification is enabled, execute runs automatically during internal process.

method.name: get_target_position
method.description: Returns the global position of the cached bone or node.

method.name: get_target_rotation
method.description: Returns the global rotation angle of the cached bone or node.

method.name: get_target_transform
method.description: Returns the global [Transform2D] of the cached bone or node.

method.name: resolve_bone
method.description: Resolves the NodePath and validates it can be cast to a Bone2D.

method.name: resolve_node
method.description: Resolves the NodePath and validates it can be cast to a CanvasItem.

method.name: set_editor_gizmo_dirty
method.description: Trigger [method _draw_editor_gizmo] to be run on the next frame, if in editor.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the modification's [method _execute] function will be called every frame during internal process.
